languages.text: {n}Абеляр обращает к вам взгляд.{/n} "Вольный Торговец обвиняет весь род или только паршивую овцу?"
{n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

languages.text: {n}アベラルドがじっと見つめてくる。{/n}「自由開拓者が糾弾するのは、腐ったリンゴだけでしょうか、それともその樽全体でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドがじっと見つめてくる。{/n}「自由開拓者が糾弾するのは、腐ったリンゴだけでしょうか、それともその樽全体でしょうか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德将目光转向你。{/n}“行商浪人，是只处决她一人，还是一网打尽？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德将目光转向你。{/n}“行商浪人，是只处决她一人，还是一网打尽？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} condamne-t-{mf|il|elle} uniquement le fruit pourri ou l'arbre tout entier ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} condamne-t-{mf|il|elle} uniquement le fruit pourri ou l'arbre tout entier ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente condena solo a la manzana podrida o a todo el árbol?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente condena solo a la manzana podrida o a todo el árbol?».

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt zu dir.{/n} "Verurteilt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nur das schwarze Schaf oder die gesamte Herde?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir Hazretleri, kurunun yanında yaş da yanmalı mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns his gaze to you.{/n} "Does the Rogue Trader condemn only the rotten apple, or the entire barrel?"
